title: 3 bedroom Manufactured 2017 Home for Rent
app_fee: Community Application fee based on number of adults on application.
posting_body: Enjoy the comfort of your own space at Oakland Glens, a well-maintained, professionally managed manufactured home community.
Oakland Glens is proud to be located in the Walled Lake School District, and within miles of many local dining, shopping, and entertainment options!
Currently we have a 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home is 1056 sq feet available for rent, and close to the community amenities.
Call today to learn more about making this home your own — this one won't last long!
Call leasing and ask about site #732!!
